movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Lots of action but awful story
review: This movie had lots of action, but the story and characters were sorry at best. It was very hard to follow, had no emotion, and was anti-climatic. The villain, Darth Maul, said only two words the whole movie, did nothing but fight with his light saber, and when he gets killed it's like 'who cares'. I felt like this movie was nothing more than a setup for episode 2 and from the looks of the movie theater, on a Friday night the first weekend it was out was only half full, the word has gotten out. Hype can only carry it so far. I felt cheated. Don't waste your money like I did.
